channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Dimension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Dimension

item.title: CVE-2023-26339|2024-08-02T11:46:24.351Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension versions 3.4.7 (and earlier) is affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-26379|2024-08-02T11:46:24.552Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension version 3.4.8 (and earlier) is affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. item.title: CVE-2023-38211|2024-08-02T17:30:14.189Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension version 3.4.9 is affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-25886|2024-08-02T11:32:12.765Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension versions 3.4.7 (and earlier) is affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when parsing a crafted file, which could result in a read past the end of an allocated memory structure. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.description: Adobe Dimension versions 3.4.7 (and earlier) is affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when parsing a crafted file, which could result in a read past the end of an allocated memory structure. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-21601|2024-08-02T09:44:01.800Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension version 3.4.6 (and earlier) are affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-38212|2024-08-02T17:30:14.109Z -- adobe -- dimension
item.description: Adobe Dimension version 3.4.9 is affected by a Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
